sentence: Morgan Luttrell, a former Navy SEAL running with the endorsement of House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy, thrashed Christian Collins, a former staffer to Sen. Ted Cruz (R-Texas) who was endorsed by conservative firebrands like Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-Ga.) and Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.).
author: Julia Manchester
title: Five takeaways from the Texas primaries

sentence: Congressional Republicans are fuming after Rep. Madison Cawthorn, R-N.C., claimed some lawmakers have invited him to sex parties and have used cocaine in front of him without offering any specifics.
title: The most popular  and unpopular  2022 candidate qualities

sentence: Greene filed a federal lawsuit to shut down the state process -- which is how GOP Rep. Madison Cawthorn fended off a similar candidacy challenge in North Carolina.
author: Marshall Cohen
title: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene testifies for more than 3 hours in hearing on whether to disqualify her from seeking reelection
